sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils = Class.create();
ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkoutItem: function() {
        var message = gs.getMessage('Unable to open this item in Catalog Builder');
        try {
            var itemId = this.getParameter('itemId');
            if (!itemId) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(message);
                return '';
            }
            var sourceItem = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
            sourceItem.get(itemId);
            if (this.canEditInBuilder(sourceItem)) {
                var type = sourceItem.sys_class_name;
                var url = '/now/build/catalog/wizard/';
                var checkoutItemId;
                if (sourceItem.state == 'draft')
                    checkoutItemId = sourceItem.sys_id;
                else
                    checkoutItemId = sn_sc.CatalogItemVersioningService.checkout(sourceItem.sys_id);

                if (checkoutItemId) {
                    var catItem = new sn_sc.CatItem(itemId + '');
                    var templateId = catItem.getTemplateUsed();
                    var wizardId = type == 'sc_cat_item_producer' ? '89bf83d4c7321010159ca1e603c260cd' : '38f351fe73221010c84e2bb43cf6a7ad';
                    url += wizardId + '/params/mode/normal/record-id/' + checkoutItemId;
                    if (templateId)
                        url += '/template-id/' + templateId;
                    return url;
                } else {
                    gs.addErrorMessage(message);
                    return '';
                }
            } else {
                gs.addErrorMessage(message);
                return '';
            }
        } catch (e) {
            gs.addErrorMessage(message);
            return '';
        }
    },

    cancelCheckout: function(itemID) {
        var itemId = this.getParameter('itemId') || itemID;
        var message = gs.getMessage("Unable to cancel checkout");
        var itemGr = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        itemGr.get(itemId);
        if (!this.canEditInBuilder(itemGr)) {
            gs.addErrorMessage(message);
            return "false";
        }
        try {
            var status = sn_sc.CatalogItemVersioningService.cancelCheckout(itemId);
            if (status + '' == "false")
                gs.addErrorMessage(message);
            return status + '';
        } catch (e) {
            gs.addErrorMessage(message);
            gs.debug(e.getMessage());
            return "false";

        }

    },

    cancelReview: function() {
        var itemId = this.getParameter('itemId');
        var message = gs.getMessage("Unable to cancel review");
        var itemGr = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        itemGr.get(itemId);

        if (!this.canCancelReview(itemGr)) {
            gs.addErrorMessage(message);
            return "false";
        }

        if (itemGr.state == 'in_review') {
            try {
                sn_sc.CatalogItemVersioningService.cancelReview(itemId);
            } catch (e) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(message);
                gs.debug(e.getMessage());
                return "false";
            }
            return 'true';
        }
        return 'false';
    },

    canCancelReview: function(itemGr) {
        return itemGr.isValidRecord() &&
            (itemGr.sys_class_name == 'sc_cat_item_producer' || itemGr.sys_class_name == 'sc_cat_item') &&
            itemGr.state == 'in_review' &&
            itemGr.canWrite();
    },

    canEditInBuilder: function(itemGr) {
        return itemGr.isValidRecord() &&
            itemGr.canWrite() &&
            (itemGr.state == '' || itemGr.state == 'published' || itemGr.state == 'draft') &&
            gs.hasRole('catalog_builder_editor') &&
            (itemGr.sys_class_name == 'sc_cat_item_producer' || itemGr.sys_class_name == 'sc_cat_item');
    },

    type: 'ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-30 10:21:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>28f9237573231010ae42d31ee2f6a725</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ServiceCatalogVersioningUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Builder" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.catalog_builder">cb7b7c243c35311068bcf327dfe37fb7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_28f9237573231010ae42d31ee2f6a725</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-18 16:24:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
